name: 2025 the 6th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence in Education Technology
content: Publication: All peer-reviewed papers accepted by AIET 2025 will be published in AIET 2025 Conference Proceedings. Indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, INSPEC, etc. All books published in the series are submitted for consideration in Web of Science. Papers of AIET 2021 \~ AIET 2024 have been published in Springer: Lecture Notes on Data Engineering and Communications Technologies successfully and indexed by Ei compendex and Scopus.
